citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
Required documentation, including the program of veterinary care, records of animal acquisition and disposition, and
record of animals on hand, was not available at the time of inspection. This documentation assures accountability for
meeting the stipulations of the Animal Welfare Act. The facility must ensure the records are available for review at the
time of inspection.
Correct from this inspection on 25 October 2023 forward.

3 sections of wire panel fencing for the goat pen had @ 4 inch sharp wire points extending inside the pen. Wire points
present a risk of injury. The facility must ensure that the animals are contained safely and protect them from injury.

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility does not have a veterinary approved and documented program of environmental enhancement for birds.
Captive birds, including poultry, require environmental enhancement to promote psychological welfare. The facility must
ensure that a written plan for environmental enhancement exists, is approved by the veterinarian, and can be reviewed at
the time of inspection.
Correct by 25 November 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
